wikipedia_page.main: Victor Ralph "Ginger" Johnson (15 April 1922 – 23 April 2013) was an English footballer.

response: *Ralph Johnson (computer scientist) (born 1955), computer science professor at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
*Ralph Johnson (philosopher) (born 1940), co-creator of the subject of Informal logic at the University of Windsor
*Ralph Johnson (musician) (born 1951), percussionist for R&B/soul band Earth, Wind, and Fire
*Ralph Johnson (fencer) (born 1948), British fencer who competed at four Olympic Games
*Ralph Johnson, 91, English footballer (Norwich City).Scorer of fastest Carrow Road goal for Norwich City dies aged 91|Norwich Evening News
